goal.tools.debugger

Enum Channel.ChannelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Channel.ChannelState>
      • goal.tools.debugger.Channel.ChannelState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Channel.ChannelState>
    Enclosing class:
    Channel

    public static enum Channel.ChannelState
extends java.lang.Enum<Channel.ChannelState>
    The state of a Channel.

    It seems that this is mainly a mix of (1) initial state (both for PAUSING and for VIEW column) for the channel in the breakpoint preferences panel (2) whether the channel is visible at all in that panel.

    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CONDITIONALVIEW
      Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger may present debug messages on the channel to the user.
      HIDDEN
      Hidden channels will never be displayed to the user (in the debug preference panel).
      HIDDENPAUSE
      Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger will always pause on the channel.
      HIDDENVIEW
      Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger will always display debug messages on the channel.
      HIDDENVIEWPAUSE
      Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger will always display debug messages on the channel AND pause.
      NONE
      Channels in the NONE state will not be displayed in the debug tracer, and will not be paused upon when stepping.
      PAUSE
      Channels in the PAUSE state will be paused upon when stepping.
      VIEW
      Channels in the VIEW state will be displayed in the debug tracer, but will not be paused upon when stepping.
      VIEWPAUSE
      Channels in the VIEWPAUSE state will be displayed in the debug tracer, and will also be paused upon when stepping.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • HIDDEN

        public static final Channel.ChannelState HIDDEN
        Hidden channels will never be displayed to the user (in the debug preference panel). They only serve as internal event notifications.

      • HIDDENPAUSE

        public static final Channel.ChannelState HIDDENPAUSE
        Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger will always pause on the channel. Useful for breakpoints.

      • HIDDENVIEW

        public static final Channel.ChannelState HIDDENVIEW
        Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger will always display debug messages on the channel.

      • HIDDENVIEWPAUSE

        public static final Channel.ChannelState HIDDENVIEWPAUSE
        Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger will always display debug messages on the channel AND pause.

      • CONDITIONALVIEW

        public static final Channel.ChannelState CONDITIONALVIEW
        Same as HIDDEN, but the debugger may present debug messages on the channel to the user.

      • NONE

        public static final Channel.ChannelState NONE
        Channels in the NONE state will not be displayed in the debug tracer, and will not be paused upon when stepping.

      • VIEW

        public static final Channel.ChannelState VIEW
        Channels in the VIEW state will be displayed in the debug tracer, but will not be paused upon when stepping.

      • PAUSE

        public static final Channel.ChannelState PAUSE
        Channels in the PAUSE state will be paused upon when stepping.

      • VIEWPAUSE

        public static final Channel.ChannelState VIEWPAUSE
        Channels in the VIEWPAUSE state will be displayed in the debug tracer, and will also be paused upon when stepping.
